content: give me your day 14 / 24 heart for christmas abbreviations chain - chain blo - back loop only difficulty mc - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet time 15 min slip_stitch - slip_stitch double_crochet - double_crochet material jute ij - invisible join tc - treble_crochet hook 3 5 mm written pattern round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet double_crochet tc double_crochet 3 tc x3 double_crochet slip_stitch blo to the first double_crochet of the round total 16 getting to the corner of the square slip_stitch to get to the corner of the square chain semi circles make a shell of 7 tc make all of the tc in the middle double_crochet from previous round - it will create a shell slip_stitch to the tc from previous round chain make second shell of 7 tc slip_stitch to the tc from previous round round 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet chain single_crochet in the tip of the heart tc from previous round single_crochet 3 single_crochet 2 in each tc from the first semi circle except the last one single_crochet 1 in the last tc from the first semi circle chain slip_stitch to the tc from round 1 chain single_crochet 1 in the first tc from second semi circle single_crochet 2 in the rest of tc from second semi circle finish with slip_stitch or ij cut the yarn and weave the ends in hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the heart congratulations you finished the 14th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 10 to go
